abilities.desc: Fires an intense energy beam, dealing damage to the target and all enemy units around it. The main target is blinded, causing them to miss all physical attacks.
abilities.name: Laser

abilities.desc: Launches rockets at the nearest visible heroes within 2500 range.
abilities.name: Heat-Seeking Missile

abilities.desc: Targets an allied unit, applying a barrier to them that blocks some damage and provides Status Resistance.
abilities.name: Defense Matrix

abilities.desc: Throws a flare towards an enemy, dealing damage, teleporting them away and reducing their Cast and Attack Range for 3 seconds.
abilities.name: Warp Flare

abilities.desc: After channeling for [4.5, 4.0, 3.5]s teleport to a target friendly structure. Level 2 allows teleporting to friendly units and Level 3 to friendly heroes.
abilities.name: Keen Conveyance

abilities.desc: CHANNELED - Resets the cooldown on most of Tinker's items and abilities.
abilities.name: Rearm
abilities.notes: Rearm works on all items except Aeon Disk, Arcane Boots, Black King Bar, Hand of Midas, Helm of the Dominator, Linken's Sphere, Meteor Hammer, Pipe of Insight, Tome of Knowledge, Refresher Orb, and any neutral items.
